title: Dell Latitude 7430 vs Lenovo ThinkPad T14 Gen 3: Which should you get?
content:
With Intel’s 12th-generation Alder Lake processors starting to roll out, we’re seeing more and more laptops powered by the new CPUs. For now, it seems like most of the new laptops are business laptops, and that means a lot of new choices are popping up. If you’re having trouble choosing, we’re here to help. In

The post Dell Latitude 7430 vs Lenovo ThinkPad T14 Gen 3: Which should you get? appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Need a new laptop for work but you're not sure which one to get? We pit the Dell Latitude 7430 and Lenovo ThinkPad T14 against each other.
